definition: ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome
lit. newborn calves do not fear tigers (idiom)/fig. the young are fearless
pinyin: chu1 sheng1 niu2 du2 bu4 pa4 hu3

sentences.english: This is what happened when the Israelites at Sinai made a visible symbol of God in the form of a golden calf.
sentences.chinese: 以色列人在西乃山用金牛犊代表上帝，就是这样犯罪。

sentences.english: Then she left the cow to the care of a hundred eyed monster, Argus.
sentences.chinese: 赫拉便将牛犊托付给百眼魔鬼阿刚斯看管。

sentences.english: Even the hides of "veal" calves are made into high-priced calfskin.
sentences.chinese: 即使是“食用”小牛犊也被用来制造高价的小牛犊皮。

sentences.english: Even the hides of "veal" calves are made into high-priced calfskin.
sentences.chinese: 即使是“食用”小牛犊也被用来制造高价的小牛犊皮。

sentences.english: The colts and calves are gambolling round the stockman.
sentences.chinese: 小马驹和小牛犊围着饲养员欢蹦乱跳。

sentences.english: I will prepare the other bull and put it on the wood but not set fire to it.
sentences.chinese: 我也预备一只牛犊放在柴上，也不点火。

sentences.english: But Maudie made an angry noise and kicked the calf away.
sentences.chinese: 但是马蒂发出愤怒的声音并且踢开牛犊。

sentences.english: A scared calf's face gilded with marmalade.
sentences.chinese: 糊满了桔子酱的脸惊惶得像头小牛犊。

sentences.english: The saying is that a bobby calf doesn't fear a tiger.
sentences.chinese: 正所谓，初生牛犊不怕虎嘛。

sentences.english: And I wondered, would those women have wept over a calf?
sentences.chinese: 我在想，那些女人，是否也曾为小牛犊哭泣过呢？

sentences.english: They used to lose three-fourths of their newborn calves each year.
sentences.chinese: 过去，每年有四分之三的新出生的牛犊会失去生命。

sentences.english: As you clamber down on to the platform, you stumble as clumsily as a calf.
sentences.chinese: 当你下到站台上时步履笨拙像一头牛犊。
小牛犊出生时有牙齿吗？

sentences.english: HERDSMAN tending his flock in a forest lost a Bull-calf from the fold.
sentences.chinese: 牧人在树林中放牛，不幸丢失了一头离群的小牛犊。

sentences.english: Take the fattened calf and slaughter it. Then let us celebrate with a feast.
sentences.chinese: 再把那只肥牛犊牵来宰了，我们应吃喝欢宴。

sentences.english: Annie went to the farmer's house feeded the little cow and got the gift very fresh.
sentences.chinese: 安妮到农民家喂牛犊得到了非常新鲜的龙虾礼物。

definition: offspring of a bull and a female yak
